<h3 id="X17835">X(17835)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st EXCOSINE TO ANTI-ORTHOCENTROIDAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (SB+SC)*(R^2*S^2+2*(3*R^2-SW)*(12*R^2-SA-2*SW)*SA)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(17835) = 4*X(74)-3*X(10606) = 3*X(74)-2*X(11598) = 4*X(110)-5*X(17821) = 3*X(154)-2*X(399) = 3*X(154)-4*X(13289) = 3*X(1498)-4*X(9934) = 3*X(1853)-4*X(10264) = 2*X(2935)-3*X(10606) = 3*X(2935)-4*X(11598) = 3*X(5085)-2*X(15141) = 4*X(6699)-3*X(15131) = 5*X(8567)-4*X(13293) = 5*X(8567)-6*X(15041) = 2*X(9934)-3*X(10117) = 9*X(10606)-8*X(11598) = 2*X(13293)-3*X(15041)</b>
<p>X(17835) lies on these lines: {3,8157}, {6,74}, {22,12270}, {24,12281}, {26,1498}, {64,265}, {110,17821}, {125,7507}, {154,399}, {184,12165}, {185,13171}, {206,12168}, {394,12219}, {511,15138}, {541,11744}, {542,9924}, {568,3357}, {1181,7722}, {1350,16163}, {1503,12317}, {1539,11472}, {1593,13417}, {1597,11807}, {1717,1854}, {1853,10264}, {2192,7727}, {2917,15102}, {3197,7724}, {3580,15311}, {3581,5899}, {3830,11559}, {5085,15141}, {5894,12022}, {5895,14852}, {5904,15097}, {5925,12244}, {6247,13203}, {6293,7689}, {6699,15131}, {6759,12308}, {7395,16223}, {7514,11561}, {7687,17810}, {7723,17814}, {8567,13293}, {9818,11557}, {9826,17825}, {9976,17813}, {10657,17826}, {10990,17818}, {11204,14805}, {11413,13201}, {11425,14448}, {12041,12228}, {12227,17809}, {12236,17822}, {12292,15811}, {12358,17811}, {12375,17819}, {12412,13754}, {13148,13198}, {14094,15647}, {15085,17845}, {15750,17701}, {17702,17834}</p>
<p>
X(17835) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (64, 10620), (5925, 12244), (14094, 15647)<br>
X(17835) = X(17847) of ABC-X3 reflections triangle<br>X(17835) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (74, 974, 5621), (74, 2935, 10606), (74, 7731, 378), (399, 13289, 154), (13293, 15041, 8567)<br></p>
